name: Smoky Has A Shotgun
description:
Made for the Mini Jam 117: Ghosts

Art/Music by BrightBuilder07

Programming by rnxu

A singular sound effect by clover

WASD to move

Left click to shoot gun (you can shotgun jump btw)

Have fun!!

Sorry that it's so unpolished we kinda ran out of time but it was fun anyways! Hopefully it's not too buggy!!
